name: Maze Gold
overview: Maze Gold is a 1-player arcade game for the VIC-20. The player tries to guide their man around a maze avoiding monsters and randomly placed pillars. On each level there are 5 gold pieces, and the player moves to the next level by collecting all gold or escaping out 1 of the 4 doors at the edge of the level. After every 3 levels, an additional monster will appear up to 6 monsters per stage. The player starts with 5 lives.
